## Conceptual Level

```{r domain-entity-table}
ddd::event_storming %>% 
    dplyr::transmute(
        Entity = title$entity(Entity), 
        Event = title$event(Event),
        Command = title$command(Command),
        Method = title$command(Method)
    ) %>% 
    dplyr::distinct(Entity, Command, Event, .keep_all = TRUE) %>% 
    tibble::rowid_to_column("#") %>% 
    kable(caption = "Pizza-Ordering Entities")
```
